name: Word2Vec Simple Classifier Processor
description: Classifies a document by comparing it's words to a set of candidate word sets (one set of words per class).

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the model to be applied. If a model with this name cannot be found, the data will go through unchanged.

parameters.name: destroy_on_eof
parameters.description: Will this model be cleaned up once EOF is reached.

parameters.name: data_field
parameters.description: The field the data resides in. Data can be textual (String) or Seq[String].
The candidate word (partially) defining this class.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: How many of the top classes to return.

parameters.name: flatten
parameters.description: If set, returns just the best scoring class.
